<a id="class_TCPServer"></a>

# TCPServer

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

A TCP server.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A TCP server. Listens to connections on a port and returns a [StreamPeerTCP](class_streampeertcp.md) when it gets an incoming connection.

\ **Note:** When exporting to Android, make sure to enable the ``INTERNET`` permission in the Android export preset before exporting the project or using one-click deploy. Otherwise, network communication of any kind will be blocked by Android.

## Method Descriptions

<!-- classref-method -->

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_TCPServer_method_is_listening"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **is_listening**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_TCPServer_method_is_listening)

Returns ``true`` if the server is currently listening for connections.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_TCPServer_method_listen"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Error](class_@globalscope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Error) **listen**\ (\ port\: [int](class_int.md), bind_address\: [String](class_string.md) = "*"\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_TCPServer_method_listen)

Listen on the `port` binding to `bind_address`.

If `bind_address` is set as ``"*"`` (default), the server will listen on all available addresses (both IPv4 and IPv6).

If `bind_address` is set as ``"0.0.0.0"`` (for IPv4) or ``"::"`` (for IPv6), the server will listen on all available addresses matching that IP type.

If `bind_address` is set to any valid address (e.g. ``"192.168.1.101"``, ``"::1"``, etc.), the server will only listen on the interface with that address (or fail if no interface with the given address exists).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_TCPServer_method_stop"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **stop**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_TCPServer_method_stop)

<!-- classref-method -->

[StreamPeerTCP](class_streampeertcp.md) **take_connection**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_TCPServer_method_take_connection)
